The Elder Scroll V Skyrim Saturn as moon with rings VERY HI RES TEX pack mod...it means 1920x1920 textures...

VERY IMPORTANT: USE ALL THE FILES FROM INDIVIDUAL FOLDER...OTHERWISE THE \"SECUNDA\" MOON (NOT SATURN) WILL BE TRANSPARENT...IT\'S DUE TO \"MOONSHADOW\" FILE WHICH IS CREATED ONLY FOR THIS PACK

Use only one of the files in the pack...
Just unrar to skyrim/Data/textures/sky
